      • fillFieldCombobox

        public static void fillFieldCombobox(DSSchemaIFace aSchema,
                                     java.lang.String aTableName,
                                     javax.swing.JComboBox aCBX,
                                     boolean aInclAstrick)
        Helper method to fill combobox with the list of field names from a "named" table schema
        Parameters:
        aSchema - the schema
        aTableName - the table name in the schema
        aCBX - the comboxbox
        aInclAstrick - if the table schema includes a field with an astrick "*" then include it also

      • isTableFieldName

        public static DSTableFieldIFace isTableFieldName(DSSchemaIFace aSchema,
                                                 java.lang.String aName,
                                                 java.lang.StringBuffer aTableName)
        Returns true if the name is of format "table name"."field name" and the table name and field name are in the schema
        Parameters:
        aSchema - schema
        aName - the full name
        aTableName - can be null, or a stringbuffer that will return the name of the table
        Returns:
        Returns true if the name is of format "table name"."field name" and the table name and field name are in the schema

      • getNodeValue

        public static java.lang.String getNodeValue(org.w3c.dom.Node aNode)
        ------------------------------------------------------------ Gets the String value of a node. First checks it's value and if that is null then it checks to see if it has a child node and gets the value of the first child. Assumption: That the first child is a #text node, delibertly NOT checking the first node's type
        Parameters:
        aNode - Parent to search (should be the document root)
        Returns:
        Returns the value of the node --------------------------------------------------------------

        ------------------------------------------------------------ Finds the first node of a given type
        Parameters:
        aNode - Parent to search (should be the document root)
        aName - Name of node to find
        Returns:
        Returns the node of that name or null --------------------------------------------------------------
